logoBox.subtitle: Streamline your invoice management process with our powerful platform. Manage providers, track payments, and collaborate efficiently.

about.title: About InvoicesFlow
about.description: InvoicesFlow is a comprehensive platform designed to streamline the management of service providers, jobs, and invoice payments. Our system connects administrators, managers, providers, and finance teams in one efficient workflow.
about.feature1: Manage Clients, Campaigns, Managers and Providers
about.feature2: Create and update jobs with detailed tracking
about.feature4: Finance confirms payment with full audit trail
about.feature5: Seamless communication between all parties through email notifications
about.step1: Admin configures a job with all necessary details
about.step2: Manager receives status updates notifications to stay informed
about.step3: Provider receives email notification to upload their invoice via a secure public link
about.step4: Admin validates job's information & documents and updates job status
about.step5: Finance confirms payment. The job status is updated and all parties receive notifications
about.a1: A provider is any person or company that provides services to your organization and needs to submit invoices for payment. This could include freelancers, consultants, agencies, or other service providers.
about.q2: How do I know when my payment is confirmed?
about.a2: Once the finance team confirms payment for your invoice, you'll receive an automatic email notification with the payment details. You can also log in to check the status if you have an account.
about.q3: When does the public upload invoice link expire?
about.a3: Public upload links for invoices expire after 7 days for security reasons. If your link has expired, please contact your manager or the administrator to generate a new upload link.
about.q4: What file formats are accepted for invoice uploads?
about.a4: The platform accepts PDF, JPG, and PNG files for invoice uploads. The maximum file size is 10MB. For best results, we recommend using PDF format for clarity and searchability.
about.forAdmins: Administrators who manage the overall workflow
